title: Great hotel for business or pleasure
text:
Checking in is relatively smooth. The bar is located to the right hand side of it. For a London hotel bar it is averagely priced.
The rooms are modern and clean. Always go for the room on the higher floors to get a better chance of a decent view.
Its a bonus in London having the pool and sauna which is located in the basement.
Makes it almost worthwhile in itself. It is so much better than the IBIS next door.
The only downside was the breakfast was average at best. Still its either here or the H10 when I'm in London. As for dining in, Why? You're in London. Eat out :-)
